translations: 提醒；使联想起（remind 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: You'll get a dialogue box when exiting the program reminding you that there are still e-mails in your outbox.
sentences.translation: 当你退出程序时，你将会收到一个对话箱提醒你在发信信箱中还有一些邮件。

sentences.sentence: Students have to be the ones reminding themselves of when a mid-term will be.
sentences.translation: 学生需要提醒自己什么时候要进行期中考试。
